title: Vegetable Pilau Rice
instructions: Rinse rice until water runs clear.
Sauté onion and garlic in oil.
Add spices and vegetables; cook 2 minutes.
Add rice + water (1:2).
Simmer covered until fluffy.

title: Grilled Chicken Brochettes
instructions: Marinate chicken with oil, garlic, salt, and pepper for 30 minutes.
Skewer with onions and peppers.
Grill until cooked through, turning occasionally.

title: Rice and Beans
instructions: Cook beans until tender.
Sauté onion and tomato in oil.
Add cooked beans, season, and simmer.
Serve with steamed rice.

title: Isombe with Peanut Sauce
instructions: Boil cassava leaves until soft.
Blend peanuts with water to make a sauce.
Cook onion and garlic in oil, add leaves and peanut sauce.
Simmer and season.

title: Banana Pancakes
instructions: Mash bananas.
Whisk in egg, milk, and dry ingredients.
Cook small ladles on an oiled pan until golden on each side.

title: Tomato Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Sauté tomato and onion.
Pour eggs and cook until set.

title: Chapati Wraps
instructions: Knead flour, water, salt, and oil to a soft dough.
Rest for 20 minutes.
Roll thin and cook on a hot pan with a little oil.

title: Tilapia with Lemon
instructions: Season fish with garlic, salt, pepper, and lemon.
Pan-fry until flaky.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Stir-fry garlic in oil.
Add sliced veggies and cook crisp-tender.
Season with soy sauce.

title: Peanut Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend all until smooth.

title: Pilau with Beef
instructions: Brown beef.
Add onion, garlic, and masala.
Add rice and water; simmer until cooked.

title: Avocado Salad
instructions: Dice ingredients.
Toss with lemon, salt, and pepper.
